diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Secondary hypertrophic osteoarthropathy associated with solitary fibrous tumor of the lung
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The diagnosis of secondary hypertrophic osteoarthropathy was based on the presence of skin changes, digital clubbing, and underlying pulmonary pathology from a solitary fibrous tumor confirmed by imaging and biopsy. The patient's symptomatic hypoglycemia and resolution of symptoms after pneumonectomy further supported the diagnosis.
